name: Community Shooter Project (WyvernLegend)
description:
CSP - Community Shooter Project

Gameplay Trailer soon here! Join our discord to find others to play the game! https://discord.gg/8q8QndP

Be a member of any special forces group of the world, although not every team of the world is implemented, we are open to suggestions for coming updates. A little sneak peak for new coming customization is the CTFSO from England!

Guns and Items have Camos and more factions will be added later down the line.

You can customize your weapon for your needs, for example the sight and the ammunition!

There are currently a lot of Free for all and Team Deathmatch games, but bomb defusing and Conquest are also playable!

The maps feature a wide variety of enviroments, every with its own unique combat engagement types. Feel free to leave any kind of feedback or bug reports in the comments. I'm not pretending that there are no bugs so please report them!

The most common region in which are most servers is in Hamburg, Germany. Set your steam download region to that and you will all play within one region.
